title: Tottenham vs Norwich live stream: how to watch Premier League from anywhere
author: kevin-lynch
summary: Will the Canaries derail Antonio Conte's Spurs revolution?
article: With Spurs unbeaten in the Premier League since his arrival, Antonio Conte appears to be sprinkling his magic in north London, but can they continue that run today against the relegation-threatened Canaries? Read on to find out how to watch Tottenham vs Norwich online and get a Premier League live stream, no matter where you are in the world today.

Spurs waltzed to a comfortable 2-0 win over Brentford in midweek, and while doubts remain over the form of star man Harry Kane, there are early signs that Conte's influence is already beginning to take effect.

Norwich also remain unbeaten under their new head coach, but boss Dean Smith will have known his side missed a massive opportunity to pick up three points against ten-man Newcastle on Tuesday, with the game ending 1-1.
The big positive coming into this game for the visitors is the expected return of Todd Cantwell, with the young midfielder having recovered from Covid-19.
Follow our guide to get a Tottenham vs Norwich live stream and watch the Premier League online from anywhere this weekend.

If you're abroad right now and struggling to tap into your local coverage of the game, you'll want a VPN. This'll help you circumvent the geo-blocking that will try to stop you watching a Tottenham vs Norwich live stream in particular parts of the world.
They're a useful means of getting around this issue, are cheap, and easy to set-up as well.
